name: Nyaaaah! 2003
overview: Snodge the Biblet returns in yet another crazy lick em up adventure. Snodge's friends have been captured by an evil biblet mafia. Therefore it's up to Snodge to find their hideout and make sure that they pay for what they have done to his friends. Can Snodge get to his friends on time, or will they be trapped in a cell for the rest of their lives?
